reviewText: In fact this product is not for my own. I bought it for one of my friend. And After she recieved it. He said that she was satisfied with it.

My son loves the chipmunks so he was excited to see this come through the mail. It cake quickly the only problem was that the disc was slightly scratched onside of package. It doesn't interrupt the play at all.
My 5 yo loves Alvin & the Chipmunk so this was a good buy. He watches it all the time.

I purchased this along with the three alvin and the  chipmunk movies as my 2 1/2 year old loves alvin and the chipmunks kept her entertained and we could watch it as a family come quiet time which is cool down time before bed.
My grandchildren love the chipmunks and I am trying to collect the entire collection that the Chipmunks have.  Thank you.

VERY CUTE FOR VALENTINES DAY! I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY DAUGHTER AS A EARLY VALENTINES GIFT. THIS IS NOW HER GO TO DVD. MANY HOURS OF THIS DVD, HAS BEEN WATCHED BY OUR FAMILY:) IF SHE LIKES IT, THEN I LOVE IT!
My daughter loved this dvd
Great Valentine gift for grand children.  Loved it
My Grandsons loved this movie!!
The kids thought it was ok, i wasn't a fan
We love all the Alvin & The Chipmunks shows, and are collecting them all.  My daughter (6) enjoys watching them and I enjoy rewatching one of my favorite childhood shows!
Love this movie! I wish this could be downloaded on my PC and Iphone tho :(
"It was okay- not awesome or horrible."  My four year old's words.
Not an authorized purchase
A great classic movie plays perfect my kids love it
Fun movie
The movies are great! Thank you!
The kids enjoyed watching the DVD.
My 5 year old adores the chipmunks and loves all of their movies!
100% happy
So cute got to love those crazy chipmunks
My 5 year olds liked it.
Chipmunks rule
LOve it
Its just as i remembered when i was a youngster.  Glad they are being sold on DVD, that way my son & i can share this timeless cartoon.
Another favorite and classic for my granddaughter and since I grew up on Alvin & the Chipmunks, I get to watch it with her also.  They came quick also and not damaged.
My niece loves the series and loves this dvd.
little girl loved it

As usual the grandkids really enjoyed it.  I am about chipmunked out, but they can seem to listen to the songs over and over.  The fact that it is a DVD and tells a story is even better in their opinion.  Would recommend.

This DVD is awesome for any Alvin and the Chipmunks fans everywhere. The episodes are so fun to watch, Valentine's Day and any day.
Episodes Included:
A Chipmunk Valentine
Dr. Simon and Mr. Heartthrob
Theodore and Juliet
Sploosh (Great episode for Simonette fans!!)
Dear Diary
I Wish I Could Speak French (Music Clip from the Original Alvin Show)
i got this for my 4 year old.  she liked it quite a bit.  it was nice that it was several episodes because she didn't have to hold her focus for as long
My 3 year old loves Alvin and the chipmunk cartoons. And as always ordering with amazon is always easy and the DVD was priced less than anywhere else I saw it for sale.

My granddaughter enjoys watching all of the "Alvin and the Chipmunk" movies.  This was an excellent purchase, as it has several different "mini-movies" wrapped up in one.  She loves it, and enjoys watching it several times a week.

I love all of the Alvin and the Chipmunks shows and collections.  This is a great mix of episodes - all pertaining to the topic of love/romance (at the appropriate kid level).  It certainly brings me back to my childhood and my 7 year-old loves it too!
What can I say, Its the Chipmunks! Kids and adults always love them and always will. Mine sure do! Bought them all for our collection.

Our grandson loves the chipmunks and we can get a breather when he sits down to watch a DVD of theirs.  He is rapt throughout the program whereas he ordinarily only watches bits and pieces of other children's videos...except for "UP"...I find that I enjoy the songs during the video even if I am not in the room with him...we don't "plug" him into videos all day long but it is nice to get a break from the chipmunks when we really need it!!!  He is almost two years old and I guess they appeal to this age group and maybe to boys rather than girls...although I haven't done any scientific comparison!!  The DVD came in a timely fashion and was packed very well.  Thanks!
ok

Captain Chipmunk is my name!

This is one of my favorite 80s cartoon movies, the songs are great and include hits such as Captain Chipmunk and I Give Up On Love.
Got it for r grandchildren love it
I loved to watch these as a kid in the 80s, good , wholesome cartoons and my kids love to watch them!
My kids watch this all the time. They love it and I love that they enjoy the same shows I enjoyed back in the 1980's.

Alvin and the Chipmunks are timeless fun.
My granddaughter enjoys every episode!
Kids enjoyed the movie!
the sound was awful.
Played it for my kids and they loved it for Valentine's Day!
kids love it
